title: Top Floor Studio W/ Sleeping Alcove, W/D In-Unit
posting_body: ['AN URBAN SANCTUARY WITH EVERYTHING YOU COULD NEED', 'OR WANT.', 'It might just be the high ceilings in your unit or the cool fitness center that make you smile.', 'All the amenities are all yours to enjoy, whenever you want, and however you prefer.', 'Enjoy the beautiful great room or take advantage of the deck and barbecue.', 'Slate living is a refuge for the individualist at heart.', 'Slate Living is good, comfortable and has a great community!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 64', 'OR Text', '64', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 460 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Beautiful views', '- Washer and dryer in each unit', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Energy-efficient Windows', '- Walk-in closets', '- Multi-zone heating', '- High ceilings', '- Patios', '- White Backsplash Tile', '- ENERGY STAR® Appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- 100% non-smoking building', '- 1,200 sq.', 'ft. Outdoor Terrace', '- Bicycle Work Storage', '- On-site additional storage', '- Conference and Media Room', '- Secure Garage Parking', '- Live/Work Units', '- Spacious lobby with seating area', '- Pet Washing Area', '- Bicycle Work Bench', '- 1,100 sq.', 'ft. fitness center', '- Fetch Package Delivery Service', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Rent: $50 per pet, Pet deposit 25% of rent.', 'max 2 pets per home', 'Some Breed Restrictions Apply', 'Income Requirements:', '3 XTimes Rental Amount', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Slate', '3040 17th Ave W, Seattle, WA, 98119', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', 'Whole Foods QFC Red Mill Burgers Ugly Mug Interbay Golf Course Pagliacci Bozcar Ale House Macrina Backery Americano Rooftop Berwing Amazon Google Apple Expedia', 'SPU Seattle Pacific University Ballard Magnolia Queen Anne Interbay South Ship Canal Trail Public Transportation Commuter Storage Dry Cleaning Magnolia Manor Park Everett Lynnwood Magnolia Affordable MFTE specials concession', 'tbRg98Or0q']
